sentence: She represented America in the opening ceremony of 2007 Special Olympics World Summer Games singing the song I Know I Can, and in the opening ceremony of Expo 2010 Shanghai China, singing the song Better City, Better Life with Jon B., both songs which she co-wrote with Quincy Jones.
